sentences.en: a photo stuck to the wall with tape
sentences.cn: 用胶布贴在墙上的照片

sentences.en: A technician loads a video tape into one of the machines.
sentences.cn: 一名技师把一盒录影带装进其中一台机器。

sentences.en: Crime-scene tape marked out the position of the murdered man.
sentences.cn: 犯罪现场隔离带标出了遇害男子的位置。

sentences.en: He pushed the play button again and ran the tape.
sentences.cn: 他又按下了播放键播放磁带。

sentences.en: He shouldn't be taping without the singer's permission.
sentences.cn: 他不应该未经歌手允许就录音。

sentences.en: I accumulated a roomful of documents and tape recordings.
sentences.cn: 我搜集了满屋子的文件和磁带录音。

sentences.en: I don't suppose you thought to turn over the tape, did you?
sentences.cn: 我认为你并没想过要把磁带换一面，是吗？

sentences.en: I stuck a tape in the deck.
sentences.cn: 我把一盘磁带放进带仓里。

sentences.en: It would be uneconomical to send a brand new tape.
sentences.cn: 寄一盘新磁带过去不合算。

sentences.en: Put the bottles into boxes and tape them up.
sentences.cn: 将这些瓶子装进箱子里，然后用胶带封好。

sentences.en: She has just taped an interview.
sentences.cn: 她刚刚录制了一次采访。

sentences.en: Tape is expensive and loses sound quality every time it is copied.
sentences.cn: 磁带成本高，而且每录制一次音质就会变差一些。

sentences.en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentences.cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

sentences.en: The camcorder winds the tape back or forward at high speed.
sentences.cn: 这款便携式摄像机可以使录像带快速倒回或前进。

sentences.en: The tape had run to the end but recorded nothing.
sentences.cn: 磁带已经转到头了，但是什么也没录上。

sentences.en: The technical superiority of laser discs over tape is well established.
sentences.cn: 激光影碟相对于磁带的技术优势早已牢牢确立。

sentences.en: Using silver tape, they taped all the doors and windows shut.
sentences.cn: 他们用银色的胶带将所有的门窗都封起来了。

sentences.en: Waddington rewound the tape and played the message again.
sentences.cn: 沃丁顿把录音带倒回去，把留言又放了一遍。

words.tran_cn: 用带子捆扎；在磁带上记录（tape的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)完全了解一个人（或东西）
n. 繁文缛节；官样文章
卷尺；钢卷尺；钢合尺；传力片
胶带座；胶纸座；胶带分割器

trans.tran_en: a narrow length of plastic that is sticky on one side and is used to stick things together
to fasten a package, box etc with sticky tape
